name: Torn Playbook Page
description: A piece of a playbook with a crucial play missing. Found in the coach's office.
relevance: Directly related to the missing coach and potential motives.

connectedClues.name: Secret Note
connectedClues.description: A cryptic note found in a locker, hinting at internal team conflicts.
connectedClues.relevance: Might explain the motive behind the coach's disappearance.

name: Security Footage
description: A USB drive containing security footage from the night of the disappearance.
relevance: Provides a visual account of the coach's last known movements.

connectedClues.name: Visitor Log
connectedClues.description: The log of all visitors on the day of the disappearance, with suspicious entries.
connectedClues.relevance: The log entries could corroborate the footage or reveal discrepancies in visitor accounts.

name: Intercepted Message
description: A message intercepted from the rival team, hinting at espionage.
relevance: Suggests a motive tied to competitive rivalry.

name: Secret Note
description: A cryptic note found in a locker, hinting at internal team conflicts.
relevance: Might explain the motive behind the coach's disappearance.

name: Visitor Log
description: The log of all visitors on the day of the disappearance, with suspicious entries.
relevance: The log entries could corroborate the footage or reveal discrepancies in visitor accounts.

name: Expired Protein Shake
description: An expired protein shake left behind in the fridge at the Training Facility. Seems irrelevant at first glance.
relevance: Low - possibly indicates neglect or haste.

name: Outdated Security Protocol
description: A binder containing outdated security protocols found in the Security Office, no longer in use.
relevance: Medium - may indicate lapses in security or outdated practices.

name: Rival Team Mascot Bobblehead
description: A bobblehead of the rival team's mascot found in the Coach's Offices. Seems purely decorative.
relevance: Low - likely a souvenir or gift with no direct link to the case.

name: Intercepted Message
description: A digital message intercepted from the rival team, containing cryptic references to the coach.
relevance: High - suggests espionage or competitive sabotage.

connectedClues.name: Secret Note
connectedClues.description: A note suggesting internal team conflicts, potentially linked to the intercepted message.
connectedClues.relevance: Medium - could provide context for the intercepted message.

name: Coach's Personal Belongings
description: A collection of personal items belonging to the coach, found unexpectedly in the Equipment Room.
relevance: High - may contain personal clues or evidence of unusual behavior.

name: Tampered Lock
description: A lock on one of the lockers in the Equipment Room shows signs of tampering.
relevance: High - indicates unauthorized access or an attempt to conceal something.

name: Worn-out Gloves
description: A pair of gloves, worn beyond recognition, found in the back of the Equipment Room.
relevance: Low - unlikely to be directly related to the case.

name: Strategic Memo
description: A memo outlining the team's strategy for the championship game, found in the Team Meeting Room. Contains personal annotations by the coach.
relevance: Medium - provides insights into the coach's thoughts and potential pressures.

name: Broken Projector
description: An old projector in the Team Meeting Room, no longer functional and seemingly irrelevant.
relevance: Low - probably not connected to the case.

name: Lost Earring
description: An earring found under the bleachers in the Stadium, likely lost during a previous event.
relevance: Low - personal item with no clear connection to the case.

name: Overheard Conversation
description: A digital recording of a conversation overheard in the Locker Room, hinting at a disagreement between the coach and a key player.
relevance: High - may shed light on interpersonal conflicts affecting the team.

connectedClues.name: Secret Note
connectedClues.description: A cryptic note found in a locker, potentially related to the overheard conversation.
connectedClues.relevance: Medium - could provide context or corroborate the content of the conversation.

name: Mismatched Cleat
description: A single cleat, found in the Locker Room, that doesn't match any owned by current team members.
relevance: Medium - unusual item that may belong to a visitor or former player.

name: Old Coffee Cup
description: An old coffee cup with the logo of a rival team, found in the Coach's Offices. Might have been left behind by a visitor.
relevance: Low - possibly a red herring, but could suggest a meeting with someone from the rival team.

connectedClues.name: Intercepted Message
connectedClues.description: A message intercepted from the rival team, containing cryptic references to the coach.
connectedClues.relevance: High - suggests espionage or competitive sabotage.

name: Personal Notes
description: A collection of personal notes from the coach, found in his office, detailing worries about team dynamics and personal challenges.
relevance: High - reveals the coach's state of mind and potential pressures.

connectedClues.relevance: Medium - provides insights into the coach's professional thoughts and potential pressures.
